abstract: Protesters meet up daily outside City Hall in Pasco, Wash, to protest fatal police shooting of Mexican immigrant Antonio Zambrano-Montes, calling for investigation to determine why officers used lethal force against him.
lead_paragraph: Demonstrators have gathered every day during the past week in front of Pasco’s city hall to demand answers in the deadly police shooting of Antonio Zambrano-Montes.

headline.main: Killing by Police in a Washington Town Stirs Protests
headline.print_headline: Killing by Police in a Washington Town Stirs Protests
